short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new tab based on user settings for the extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension you can decide which page to load when you open a new tab.
There are 3 options:
1. Default new tab page
2. Blank page
3. Custom page based on the user provided url.

******
One additional feature is that you can open a new tab next to your active tab by pressing Ctrl+Shift+Y(for windows, Command+Shift+Y for mac) or by pressing the extension icon.
******

This my first chrome extension :).
Please report any issues that you find in reviews or support section. Also suggest any other feature that you would like to see in this extension.
